Details.Name: sc_main_benefit
Details.Feature: Complimentary enrolment into Maybank Frequent Flyer Programme.
Earn 5X TREATS Points (or 2 air miles) for every S$1 spent on travel-related expenses & overseas expenditure.
Complimentary access to selected VIP airport lounges.

Details.Name: sc_disclosure
Details.Feature: S$25 is applicable to convert TREATS Points to air miles.

Details.Name: sc_airmiles_details
Details.Feature: Earn 5X TREATS Points (or 2 air miles) with every S$1 charged for air ticket(s), travel package(s), overseas transactions, and purchases made at DFS stores in Singapore Changi Airport
Earn 10 TREATS Points (or 4 air miles) with every dollar spent with agoda.com/horizon and local telcos
Complimentary access to selected VIP airport lounges (Ambassador Transit Lounge and Plaza Premium Lounge) with min. charge S$400
Complimentary travel insurance coverage of up to S$1,000,000

Details.Name: sc_rewards_details
Details.Feature: Earn 10X TREATS Points (or 4 air miles) for every S$1 spent on agoda.com/horizon and for transactions with any telecommunication companies in Singapore including retail purchases and bill payments
Earn 5X TREATS Points (or 2 air miles) for every S$1 spent on travel-related and overseas expenses
Redeem TREATS Points for frequent flyer miles, shopping and dining vouchers and more
